The 5 files in the LISST-100X Ship Disk MATLAB folder are:
getscat.m
tt2mat.m
invert.p
compute_mean.m
vdcorr.m

For instructions on how to use these files to process your LISST-100X data in MATLAB, point your browser to the article 'Processing LISST-100 and LISST-100X data in MATLAB' on Sequoia Scientific, Inc.'s website: http://www.sequoiasci.com/article/processing-lisst-100-and-lisst-100x-data-in-matlab/

Questions? info@sequoiasci.com can help!

DRD - 2014-4-2
